overview: Just after Carson's gang murder members of a wagon train, Rusty and Clem come along and are arrested. Knowing they are innocent Judge Coleman breaks them out and sends them after Carson. They join Carson's gang to learn of their next raid but the Marshal arrests them for the wagon train murders.
tagline: THEY CALLED HIM THE GALLOPING PRAIRIE LAWYER...Because he was full of two-fisted advice!
title: Border Wolves
